About the Company: Raunaq International Limitedengaged in turnkey execution of Engineering Projects, is a group company of theSurinder P. Kanwar Group, having well established companies likeBharat Gears Limited,Clip-Lok Simpak (India) Pvt.Limited and Raunaq International Limited. All these companies have been meeting the escalating demands of national & international clients, with their quality manufactured products and engineering services for the core sector of industries and have a proven track record in the field of manufacturing Automobile Gear Boxes and Project Works.
